TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The main blood vessel that supplies blood to a kidney and its nearby adrenal gland and ureter. There is a renal artery for each kidney.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Vaso sanguíneo principal que lleva sangre al riñón y su glándula suprarrenal y uréter cercanos. Hay una arteria renal para cada riñón.
